career_path.summary: Graduates of a pediatric dentistry course have a wide array of career options, including teaching in academic settings, establishing private practices given the significant demand and limited supply of pediatric dentists in India, working in corporate hospitals with a growing need for specialized dental care, joining the Indian armed forces where they are employed and trained, securing government positions at both central and state levels, exploring international career opportunities, contributing to the dental trade industry, functioning as independent consultants, and pursuing careers in research and clinical trials.
career_path.raw_content:
Career path you can choose after the course
• Teaching: A fulfilling academic career contributing to nation building in the finest traditions of Indian culture can be a reality for a postgraduate of pediatric dentistry.
• Private practice: Huge opportunity awaits in the form of creating a successful private practice based on pediatric dentistry as almost 40% of Indian population is children with hardly any pediatric dentists around.
• Corporate hospitals: A bright future awaits the postgraduate in the corporate hospitals as there is a growing demand for pediatric dental care.
• Indian armed forces: The three wings of the Indian armed forces employ pediatric dentists and also trains them as soldiers. A dream come true for many
• Government jobs: Both central and state governments employ pediatric dentists in their work force.
• Wider horizons in the form of relocating to other countries.
• The dental trade industry needs pediatric dentists to help in their growth.
• To work as an independent consultant in the private practice environment.
• Research and clinical trials can also be a full-time career.
